mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM( SELECT SUM(prod_save_amt) as prod_save_amt, prod_code, find_prod_name(prod_code) as prod_code_name FROM sales_in GROUP BY prod_code ORDER BY prod_save_amt DESC)a) b WHERE rn <=5

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT SUM(sales_out_amt) as sales_out_amt, prod_code, find_prod_name(prod_code) as prod_code_name FROM sales_out WHERE TRUNC(sales_out_date) = TRUNC(sysdate) GROUP BY prod_code, find_prod_name(prod_code) ORDER BY sales_out_amt DESC ) a ) b WHERE rn <= 5
